posts.post_content:
Hello to all my net54 friends,
i am looking for a bunch of T 206 (and other T, E, misc issues) of Frank Isbell cards and photos. Any programs, clippings and photos would be great, too.
Mutliples are ok, too. Primarily Chicago Americansm but others........
Please message me here with what you have or email us at: [url]bh3443@aol.com[/url].
Thank you very much. Sincerely, Bill Hedin
3 Murray Road, Framingham, MA 01701
